entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
